title: authme 5.4数据库错误
author: retgt
txt_content:
我的服务器是面板服，装了authme之后把面板的数据库数据都按着填写到authme的config.yml
之后服务器就不停重启，应该要怎么解决
————————————————

Authme加载好后的WARN如下
> [15:58:27 WARN]: [AuthMe] Can't initialize the MySQL database: [CommunicationsException]: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
> [15:58:27 WARN]: [AuthMe] Please check your database settings in the config.yml file!
> [15:58:27 WARN]: [AuthMe] Could not create data source: [CommunicationsException]: Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.
> [15:58:27 WARN]: [AuthMe] Aborting initialization of AuthMe: [IllegalStateException]: Error during initialization of data source
> [15:58:27 WARN]: [AuthMe] THE SERVER IS GOING TO SHUT DOWN AS DEFINED IN THE CONFIGURATION!
> [15:58:27 INFO]: [AuthMe] Waiting for 0 tasks to finish
> [15:58:27 INFO]: [AuthMe] AuthMe 5.4-SNAPSHOT-b1864 disabled!

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
应该是无法连接MySQL  绝大多数版面服都只开了一个MC端口的 类似数据库  网页地图等均无法使用
建议使用VPS 如果想方便管理的话自己用MCM搭个版面

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 建议与服务商联系寻求解决方案，好多面板服的SQL数据库都不太好用，建议找客服帮你配置一下
